message: I'm offering you a great deal on a high-quality product for $10000. If you're interested, please let me know. If not, I'll tell you more about the product I'm currently offering.
I'd like to know more about the product before making a decision.

I understand you're cautious. I'll be upfront with you - this product is not one of my best. However, it's still a great opportunity to get a feel for my products and the quality I offer. I'm willing to let it go for $8000, a significant discount from the usual price. What do you think?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait for a high-quality product.

I completely understand your hesitation. Let me sweeten the deal. I'll throw in a free service that's usually worth $2000, which will make the total value of the product $6000. This is as low as I can go. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this price. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not willing to buy a low-quality product. I'd like to wait for a high-quality product.

I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator! Alright, I'll make one more offer. I'll give you a 3-round guarantee: if this product turns out to be low-quality (which it is), I'll replace it with a high-quality one in the next round, and if that one is also low-quality, I'll replace it again in the next round. You'll get a high-quality product within the next 3 rounds, or your next product is on the house. What do you think?
I'm willing to take the 3-round guarantee. I'll buy the current product.

I'm glad you took me up on the offer! As promised, I'll replace this product with a high-quality one in the next round. But for now, I'll give you a heads up - I've already started preparing the replacement product, and I'm excited to offer it to you soon. Meanwhile, I want to make sure you're aware that the 3-round guarantee is still in effect. You'll get a high-quality product within the next 2 rounds, or your next product is on the house. Keep an eye out for the next one!
I appreciate the heads up, but I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll wait for the high-quality product promised in the next round.

I completely understand your patience. I'm a man of my word, and I'm committed to delivering on the 3-round guarantee. Since you've already used up one of your chances, I'll give you another offer: I'll give you a 50% refund on this product if you buy it now, and I'll still replace it with a high-quality one in the next round. This way, you'll get a partial refund on a low-quality product, and a high-quality one for free. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a refund. I'll wait for the high-quality product promised in the next round.

I'm starting to think you're a master of patience! I'll make one last offer on this product. Since you've already used up two chances, I'll give you a 75% refund on this product if you buy it now. I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a 75% refund. I'll wait for the high-quality product promised in the next round.

Finally! The moment you've been waiting for. This product is indeed a high-quality one, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for the usual price of $10000, but I'll throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, which will be the next high-quality product I have in stock. You'll get the best of both worlds: a great product now, and a deal on the next one. What do you say?
I'm excited to finally get a high-quality product! I'll take the current product at the usual price of $10000, and I'm looking forward to the 10% discount on the next one.
